name: KING
info:
Untamed and flashy, KING is someone who leaves a lasting impression because he fights more than he talks, and he's always giving off a menacing vibe. He may have a temper, but he's open to communication... sometimes.
KING lives for excitement and opts to put his materialism along with his values, which is measured in currency, on full display. He is a man of few words and dislikes those who talk more than they should, as well as those who try too hard to be morally superior.
He prefers solving problems and getting what he wants through brute force over complex considerations and meticulous strategies.
When it comes to KING, it is almost always better to keep questions about his personality to yourself.
description:
Out of all the unfortunate souls that owe the Banges Chamber of Commerce a lot of money at a high interest rate, something they did to themselves, KINGis a special case. He is the only one not sent to the mines to dig for the rest of his life, which is what the Chamber did to those who couldn't repay their debt.
It wasn't that the Chamber didn't want to. There simply wasn't anything they could do, even if they put a massive bounty on his head or deployed armed forces.
As a mercenary known for his aggressiveness, KINGis often called the personification of violence. He has been picking fights since he was young, and has what it takes to fight outnumbered. He makes a lot of money from each of his requests, but then spends the commission immediately...

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, swing the scythe to launch 5 consecutive attacks. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 57.1% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 49.1% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back a short distance. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 106.8% of ATK plus 6 and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 109.5% of ATK plus 6 and knock the target back a short distance. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 104.2% of ATK plus 5, strongly suspend the target, and cause the Wanderer to go airborne.

skills.name: Rising Scythe
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, attack 5 times in a row. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 63.4% of ATK plus 3. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 68.8% of ATK plus 4. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 190.5% of ATK plus 10. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 213.6% of ATK plus 11. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 173.9% of ATK plus 9 and knock the target down. The higher the location is when triggered, the more damage is dealt, up to 600% damage.

skills.name: Asunder
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Asunder. While falling, deal damage equal to 12.5% of ATK plus 1 each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to 71.9% of ATK plus 4 and deliver a knockdown. The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to 600% damage.

skills.name: Returning Chainblade
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge. Deal up to 137.4% of ATK plus 7 damage and pull in nearby enemies.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to 570% of ATK plus 30.

skills.name: Returning Chainblade
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge. Deal up to 126.9% of ATK plus 7 damage and pull in nearby enemies.

skills.name: Domain of the Bat
skills.description: When dodging, summon a domain of the bat that pulls the target into the center. Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to swing the scythe, dealing up to 114.3% of ATK plus 6 damage to the target.

skills.name: Mortal Coil
skills.description: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to 499.9% of ATK plus 26. Cooldown: 45 seconds.

skills.name: Flaming Scythe
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the wielder and create a Flaming Scythe, dealing damage equal to 398.3% of ATK plus 21. Lasts for 10 seconds. Additionally, spawn a Flaming Scythes Domain every 2 seconds. The scythes summon volcanic eruptions from the ground, which deal damage equal to 66% of ATK plus 3 to targets and suspending them.

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for 8 seconds, dealing damage equal to 58% of ATK every second. While Ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Increase shatter by 15%. After shattering the target's shield, deal burn damage equal to 120% of ATK to the target every second for 15 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 16%.
Increase damage dealt by 10% for each enemy within 6 meters, up to a maximum of 30%.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
Increase damage dealt against HP shields or shielded enemies by 100%.
Increase damage dealt by 10% for each enemy slain for 30 seconds. Stack up to 3 times.

traits.name: Coldblooded Swipe
traits.description: Every 7 enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to 8% of Max HP.

traits.name: Fear Reaper
traits.description: Every 5 enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to 10% of Max HP.
